text: Don Granato doesnt expect Kyle Okposo (non-COVID illness) tonight but he is a possibility. Brandon Biro is expected to make his NHL debut. Craig Anderson starts.
#Sabres are breaking their eight-game run of alternating goalies. Craig Anderson has had enough rest and will start tonight in Montreal.
Craig Anderson will be in the crease on Wednesday against Montreal. For Fantasy Analysis Click Here: https://t.co/d55ATbJCU6
